The claim originated from two links circ: one from RCatholics.com and the other from Matrix Drops.
The RCatholics: com link, dated August 7, 2017, mentioned a discovery by NASA regarding the "living" nature of Mexico City's Our Lady of Guadalupe tilma.
The Matrix Drops link: although not published in 2017, suggested that the tilma had qualities that were impossible to replicate and did not mention NASA.
Biophysicist Phillip Callahan: s analysis of the tilma using infrared technology revealed differences in texture and coloration that are impossible to recreate, and he also discovered that the tilma maintains a constant temperature of 98.6 degrees Fahrenheit, similar to that of a living person.
